page.title: 07The Orlit Estate Great Lever
page.content:
The Orlit prefab houses were built by the council in the late l940's. Over the years there have been complaints about dampness, cold and condensation. 2 years ago a{Tenants' Association}was formed to deal with problems affecting the community e.g. housing and street repairs,lack of play facilities, glue sniffing etc.{Street Leaders}were appointed to visit and help their neighbours. They also collect 20p per week from the residents, subscriptions which pay for events such as childrens parties & day trips to Blackpool, fun days during the holidays, dances for old people, fancy-dress football etc. A{Cub Pack}was started for boys aged 7-10 and weekly meetings are held at Lever Edge County Primary School.
Melanie Hall.
